name: Deathwatch Training
shortContent: Against Xenos, the character automatically confirms all Righteous Fury results.
content:
All Deathwatch Space Marines automatically confirm any
Righteous Fury results (see page 245) against alien enemies
without needing to re-roll the Ballistic Skill Test or Weapon
Skill Test.
extraSubCategories: Adeptus Astartes, member of the Deathwatch
